title: 24: S4E24 – "Gruesome Goodbyes" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this SEASON FINALE episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from authors Michael Ward, Travis Brown, Ben Cook, and Ghost_Eye_Tree, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about harrowing heists, local legends, invisible attackers, and creeps that crawl. Season 5 begins next week, and I hope you’ll join me then, for the launch of a brand-new set of 24 incredible episodes! In this episode, we highlight the ZonLi Weighted Blanket: https://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/zonli/ Sign up to our mailing list by January 12, 2020 for your chance to win one FREE: https://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/otis/ See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: https://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s4e24
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
